metadata.Title: CVE-2022-26496 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: In nbd-server in nbd before 3.24, there is a stack-based buffer overflow. An attacker can cause a buffer overflow in the parsing of the name field by sending a crafted NBD_OPT_INFO or NBD_OPT_GO message with an large value as the length of the name.

criterions.comment: nbd: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
